<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1228</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hammer in the Jewish Holidays1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hammer im jüdischen Holidays1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Marteau dans le Holidays1 juif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Martelo no Holidays1 jewish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Martello nel Holidays1 ebreo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφυρί στο εβραϊκό Holidays1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Martillo en el Holidays1 judío</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners review the Jewish holidays through an interactive, fun and exciting activity. Focusing on speed, accuracy, and comprehension, the student must locate the holiday on the blackboard, and “hammer” the Jewish festival.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewish holidays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hammer</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger wiederholen die jüdischen Feiertage 
durch ein interaktives, einen Spaß und eine aufregende Aktivität. 
Konzentrierend auf Geschwindigkeit, Genauigkeit und Erfassen, 
muß der Kursteilnehmer den Feiertag auf der Tafel und?hammer 
lokalisieren? das jüdische Festival.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants passent en revue les vacances 
juives par un interactif, un amusement et une activité passionnante. 
Se concentrant sur la vitesse, l'exactitude, et la 
compréhension, l'étudiant doit localiser les vacances sur le tableau
noir, et le ?hammer ? le festival juif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners revêem os feriados jewish com um 
interativo, um divertimento e uma atividade emocionante. 
Focalizando na velocidade, na exatidão, e na compreensão, o 
estudante deve encontrar o feriado no quadro-negro, e o?hammer? 
o festival jewish.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti rivedono le feste ebree con un 
interattivo, un divertimento e un'attività emozionante. 
Mettendo a fuoco sulla velocità, sull'esattezza e sulla 
comprensione, l'allievo deve individuare la festa sulla lavagna ed 
il?hammer? il festival ebreo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι αναθεωρούν τις εβραϊκές διακοπές μέσω 
ενός διαλογικού, μιας διασκέδασης και συναρπαστικής μιας 
δραστηριότητας. Εστιάζοντας στην ταχύτητα, την ακρίβεια, και
την κατανόηση, ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να εντοπίσει τις διακοπές στον
πίνακα, και ?hammer; το εβραϊκό φεστιβάλ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes repasan los días de fiesta 
judíos con un interactivo, una diversión y una actividad 
emocionante. ¿Centrándose en velocidad, exactitud, y la 
comprensión, el estudiante debe localizar el día de fiesta en la 
pizarra, y el?hammer? el festival judío.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jüdische Feiertage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hammer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vacances juives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">marteau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">feriados jewish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">martelo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">feste ebree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">martello</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εβραϊκές διακοπές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δραστηριότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σφυρί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">días de fiesta judíos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">martillo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
